text:
I'm using ThreadPool.java in an application outside of Tomcat. There appears to 
be a problem in initializing threads. When a thread is put onto the pool using 
the runIt method of ControlRunnable, the thread data is not reread using 
getInitData() since noThData is not reset to true. I fixed this by setting 
this.noThData=true in the runIt method of ControlRunnable.
